scenes.background: Monica sighs and looks at Bob after considering mixing elements from each suggestion.
scenes.description: Mixing elements? That sounds complicated and might not please anyone.

options.text: Maybe we can simplify it by picking just the best parts of each idea.
options.analysis: You tried to address the complexity by simplifying, showing good perception and empathy, but self-regulation and social skills were moderate.

options.text: We could give it a try and see if everyone is happy with the result.
options.analysis: You suggested a trial approach, showing good self-regulation and social skills, but perception and empathy were moderate.

options.text: Compromise is always tricky, but it's worth the effort to keep everyone satisfied.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the difficulty, showing good empathy and motivation, but social skills and perception were lower.
